name: auth-mailchimp-sync-functions
description: Add new users to a Mailchimp list, and delete them from the list when they delete their account.

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: (cd tests/integration && firebase emulators:exec 'npm run jest -- --testPathIgnorePatterns=unit/ --detectOpenHandles --forceExit' --project demo-test)
scripts.test:integration:watch: (cd tests/integration && firebase emulators:exec 'npm run jest -- --testPathIgnorePatterns=unit/ --watch --detectOpenHandles --forceExit' --project demo-test)
